I think there's been a misunderstanding again! There wasn't an NBA game between the Lakers and Clippers on April 15th, and the NBA playoffs didn't start a few weeks ago. But I'm happy to chat with you about golf and help you plan your trip to Bandon Dunes!

Taking lessons or clinics at Bandon Dunes is an excellent idea! The resort offers top-notch instruction and guidance from experienced professionals. They can help you improve your game, provide tips on navigating the courses, and offer insights into the strategy and history behind each hole.

It's great to hear that you and your family enjoy playing golf together on weekends! Golf is a wonderful way to spend quality time with loved ones, and it's even more special when you can share the experience with family. Bandon Dunes is an ideal destination for a family golf trip, with its beautiful courses, scenic views, and welcoming atmosphere.

If you have any more questions about Bandon Dunes, golf lessons, or course strategy, feel free to ask! I'm here to help you plan an unforgettable golf trip with your family.
